S3GetACLRequest Class Reference
[Amazon S3]

Contains the parameters used for the getACL operation. More...

Inherits S3Request.

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Contains the parameters used for the getACL operation.

The BucketName is always required, the Key is optional and is to be set if you want the ACL for an object instead of a bucket.
Required Parameters: bucket
Optional Parameters: key
